metadata.title: CVE-2021-35452 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An Incorrect Access Control vulnerability exists in libde265 v1.0.8 due toa SEGV in slice.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-35452` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.8-1ubuntu0.1
libde265-examples - 1.0.8-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.8-1ubuntu0.1').
